abstract: A judge in Poland says he has asked American officials for more documents to support their request for the extradition of Roman Polanski.

headline.main: Polish Judge Wants More From U.S. on Polanski Extradition Request
headline.print_headline: More Documents Sought On Polanski Extradition

snippet: A judge in Poland says he has asked American officials for more documents to support their request for the extradition of Roman Polanski.
